@antcolony3 wrote:

for (int i=0; i<playerLevel.length; i++) { //Setting Levels if (i == 3) { playerLevel[i] = 99; playerXP[i] = 14000000; } else { playerLevel[i] = 1; playerXP[i] = 0; } }
is this how i change max lvl aand max xp…or can u tell me what it is?
